Whats a sinbo - never heard of that

shuko are not exclusive to Ninja and shuriken/shaken
are also used by Samurai schools. Negishi Ryu ios one
non ninja ryu that teaches it, the list is endless.

Kusarigama were also samurai items as well. Toda Ryu
and Araki ryu are just schools famous for Kusarigama.

Paul


--- "Ignacio R. Moreira" <kanchoshihan@...>
wrote:

---------------------------------
Kool!

But you have to remember...Sai = Okinawan
Weaponry...not ninja!


ninja Weapons...to name a few...
1.  Shuko and Ashiko
2. Sinbo
3.  Kusari gama
4.  shaken and shuriken...

though they were used almost by anyone, I believe the
ninja made 
these few very famous...

Well, the ichimonji no kamae is a "traditional" ninja 
posture...guess what...what is the weapon they hold in
hands??

Anyone have an opinion?


Later...
